lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - Of Beauty Pageants and Plastic Surgery

sentence.idiomatic: I originally thought he was your boyfriend.
He thought you weren't coming, so he left.
Don't think that just because you are the boss' son I am afraid of you.
Our company does not allow employees to wear jeans.
The boss finally allowed me to bring my pet to work.
Taking photos is not permitted here.
A lot of female stars have had cosmetic surgery.
I still like the way you looked before you had cosmetic surgery better.
If I were you, I would have gotten cosmetic surgery a long time ago.
Do whatever you want. No one here will pay any attention.
There are so many cars here, it's very dangerous for children to be playing here. How can you adults not be paying any attention?
Our boss is on top of everything.
I've heard that his girlfriend is a man-made beauty.
These past few years our country has launched a lot of man-made satellites.
This kind of crystal is natural--not synthetic, so it's very expensive.
You always smile so unnaturally in every photo.
When you are having an interview, act more natural. Don't be so nervous.
Black hair suits you best--it looks more natural.
You are really out of it--you don't even know what an electronic dictionary is.
Your way of chasing girls is so not with it. No wonder you are still single.
Although the plot of that movie is cheesy, the scenes are really beautiful.
Nowadays, medical technology is very developed; your illness can definitely be cured.
After our factory implemented advanced production technology, efficiency went up a lot.
The techniques he uses to defraud people are brilliant.
He has a growth here; we will need to operate.
She will do absolutely anything to lose weight. She's had quite a few operations.
Don't worry. The surgery to create a double eyelid is just a minor operation--it isn't dangerous.
Hey, Liu Jia, there's no time. Hurry up and change clothes!
Monica, I thought we didn't need to wear swimsuits...
It's a beauty pageant. Of course we have to wear them!
Ah, look at that girl. She definitely had a boob job.
Yeah! When we signed up, her chest was totally flat.
Huh? The pageant allows cosmetic surgery?
They don't pay any attention to that!
Yeah, as long as the girls are beautiful, it's fine.
Of the girls here, most are artificial.
What? They look natural to me.
Liu Jia, you're really not with it. Nowadays the surgery is really advanced. You can't tell by looking.
Right. Besides, nose jobs, boob jobs, and eye jobs are all minor surgery. They're the most basic requisites for a beauty pageant.
You mean if you don't have surgery you have no hope?
You could say that.
Yeah, everyone is so perfect. If you don't have surgery, how can you out-compete them?
Looks like this pageant is really not for me.

word.literal: to be able to compare with
